#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
    int n,sum,i;
    
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        sum=0;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(n%i==0)
        {
            sum+=i;
        }
    }
    cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
